# viewBoundsChanged(_:)

**Instance Method**

Handles an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/boundsDidChangeNotification], passed in the `aNotification` argument, by updating a containing [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrollView] based on the new bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func viewBoundsChanged(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Overriding NSView Methods

- **viewFrameChanged(_:)**: Handles an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/frameDidChangeNotification], passed in the `aNotification` argument, by updating a containing [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrollView] based on the new frame.
